name: Demon Guts - Halloween Supporter Pack
description:
A. Notes for what I should work on are always welcome! Use this link to give me feedback - https://forms.gle/AVtQG6GN4RMXqh1f9

Q. How do I know when  the next game is out?
A. Head over to https://www.facebook.com/FinalOcto/ and click follow to stay updated. I minimize boring fluff and only post when there are decent releases - saving your time and mine.
